name: LAB Advertising
description:
Would you like to advertise on the LAB? It's really simple. I offer a few affordable ways you can join us. Click on the buttons below to get started. I'll email you and we can work on the ad together. You get more than just an ad when you advertise on the LAB. I'll be featuring you in posts on the LAB throughout your stay. Â I'm looking forward to seeing you on the LAB!

  • Choose between 1, 6 and 12 months of advertising in my side bar. The ad size is 300px x 150px. If you need help designing the ad, just let me know and I'll gladly help design the perfect ad for you.
Google Analytics: September 2013: 29,039 page views, 16,185 visitors, 12,712 unique
October 2013: 32,993 page views, 17,446 visitors, 13,780 unique
November 2013: 39,271 page views, 18,821 visitors, 14,871 unique
December Special: Get 6 months for $150 and 12 months for $275. This offer expires on December 31, 2013. We Accept via PayPal: Cash, Visa, MasterCard, Discovery & AmEx

name: LAB BLOG BUILD
description:
If you've hung out in the LAB for any period of time, you've heard me singing the same song over and over again: If you're a handmaker, you need a blog. I've shown you stats of artists who've watched their web traffic explode because of blogging, bringing fresh fans to their handmade shops. I've also showcased some pretty amazing blogs along the way, in the hopes that they will inspire you to make blogging a part of your Handmade Trifecta.

Yet, I know that some of you really want to add a blog to your handmade strategy, but you can't seem to figure out how. You know you want something attractive, functional and easy to maintain, but getting there is the challenge. Well, that's all about to change. Introducing the LAB Blog Build. Let the LAB build you the perfect Wordpress.org blog for your Handmade Trifecta.

What do you get with a LAB Blog Build? I'm glad you asked. Here's what you'll receive:

  • Basic Theme Modification: Starting with your self-hosted Wordpress.org installation, I will find a theme and modify it to fit your blogging needs. I have a list of great templates that I prefer to use from some very talented designers including Wpshower, Elmastudio, Blog Milk, Wpexplorer and Dessign, to name a few. However, I'll be more than glad to use a template of your choice.
  • Plugins Selection: There are a billion Wordpress plugins out there and it can be really challenging to find the perfect set for your blog. Let me do the dirty work for you. I'll find them, install them and show you how they work.
  • Branding & Graphic Design: You'll want your blog to coordinate with your online shop and social media, so I'll design the right graphics to pull your Handmade Trifecta all together.
  • Etsy Shop Integration: With some simple modifications and a plugin or two, we'll give your Etsy shop a new source of exposure by integrating it into your blog.
  • Post Layout Options: One of the biggest obstacles to regular blogging is trying to figure out what to blog about and how. I'll help you with some layout options that will give your posts a touch of razzamatazz and pizzazz.
  • Social Media Management: Integrating your social media is absolutely essential. I'll make sure that you are all connected and that your blog posts automatically find their way to Twitter, Facebook and beyond.
  • Free Ad: Just to make sure that folks know you've joined the world of blogging, I've tossed in 3 free months of advertising on the LAB.
  • Support: The build also comes with 2 months of email and phone support.

Your LAB Blog Build should take 5 weeks or less to complete. Looking for a web host? I have a great recommendation for you. Let's talk!

December Special: Get a LAB Blog Build for only $350. This offer ends on December 31, 2013 We Accept via PayPal: Cash, Visa, MasterCard, Discovery & AmEx

name: LAB Partners
description:
Build it and they will come, or so the famous expression goes. Now if only it was that easy when it comes to building your Handmade Trifecta: an online shop, social media presence and a active blog. Each step can be a challenge and sometimes, you just need a little help. That's where I come in.

I've spent the last few years focused solely on being a friendly advocate for the handmade community. I'd like to bring my experience (plus my knowledge as a brand marketing and social media manager and online community director) to your handmade business. Let's be LAB Partners!

The LAB Partners program makes me your personal advocate. Here's what we can work on together:

  • E-commerce Shop Review
  • Building the perfect Wordpress blog
  • Managing your Social Media
  • Logo/Shop Header Design
  • Business Coaching
  • Brand Management
  • Inspirational Cheerleading
The LAB Partner program consists of 6 months or 1 year (4 hours per month) of support via phone, FaceTime, Google Hangout or Skype, plus unlimited email support. I've worked with some very talented artists in the past year and I'd like to work with you to help make your handmade business soar in 2014 and beyond. Past LAB Partners: UNURTH HOME

OXLEY & MORTIMER

LEILEI ALOHA

TROPICAL DREAMS MACADAMIA

OPUS STONE

INKCLOSURE

December Special: Get a year of LAB Partner mentoring for just $720 (half of regular price of $1440) or $360 for 6 months. This offer ends on December 31, 2013. We Accept via PayPal: Cash, Visa, MasterCard, Discovery & AmEx

name: The HOT HANDMADE Shop
description: The HOT HANDMADE Shop is the official IAMTHELAB.com curated shop, full of the most amazing modern handmade goods from all over the world. If you've been featured on IAMTHELAB.com, you already have a place in the HOT HANDMADE Shop. A 4 month stay is only $20 and a year is just $50. DECEMBER 2013 SPECIAL: Get a full year of the HOT HANDMADE Shop for just $40. This offer ends on December 31, 2013. We Accept via PayPal: Cash, Visa, MasterCard, Discovery & AmEx
